news.title: Molecules Mimic Mesmerizing Math
news.summary: Stephen McCarthy, Chemistry World Computer modelling has shown for the first time how organic molecules could assemble into molecular quasicrystals, raising the possibility of new materials with exotic properties.

news.title: Molecules mimic mesmerising mathematics
news.summary: Computer modelling predicts formation of molecular quasicrystals

author.name: RSC Advances
author.description: An international journal to further the chemical sciences published by the Royal Society of Chemistry
